name: CubeBlock
description:
CubeBlock is an arcade game which objective is to form quads of blocks of the same color to destroy them and obtain points or complete objectives.

Two game modes:

  • Levels: play in different levels, starting with tutorials to learn the mechanics of the game and then complete challenges in each level.
  • Arcade mode: try to get the maximum score as possible. There is a time limit, but destroying blocks of the same color you can reach new levels, increasing the time limit.
